movie.title: The Lovely Bones
movie.plot: After being brutally murdered, 14-year-old Susie Salmon watches from heaven over her grief-stricken family -- and her killer. As she observes their daily lives, she must balance her thirst for revenge with her desire for her family to heal.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 45 nominations.
